text: Hamono sumorai mohho az rui hukm va taqdiri Alloh, dar kitoʙi Alloh, - az on ruz, ki osmonhovu zaminro ʙijofarida, - duvozdah ast. Cahor moh mohhoi haromand. In ast dini haq. Dar on mohho ʙa saʙaʙi canghoi nohaq ʙar xestan sitam makuned. Va hamcunon, ki musrikon hamagi ʙa cangi sumo ʙarxostand, hamagi ʙa cangi onho ʙarxezed. Va ʙidoned, ki hamono Alloh ʙo parhezgoron ast, ononro nusrat medihad va pojdorason megardonad
